archives.title: Kangyur Manuscript Collection
archives.description: Ancient Buddhist canonical texts written in traditional Tibetan script on handmade paper. This collection contains 108 volumes of the Buddha's teachings.

archives.title: Tara Deity Thangka Painting
archives.description: Exquisite thangka painting depicting Green Tara, the Buddhist goddess of compassion and protection, painted with mineral pigments on silk.

archives.title: Monastery Foundation Chronicles
archives.description: Official records documenting the establishment and early history of monasteries in Sikkim, including land grants and royal patronage.

archives.title: Vajrayana Ritual Instructions
archives.description: Detailed instructions for Vajrayana Buddhist rituals and ceremonies, including mandala construction and meditation practices.

archives.title: Mandala Sand Art Documentation
archives.description: Photographic documentation and sketches of intricate sand mandala creations, capturing the impermanent art form before dissolution.

archives.title: Traditional Medicine Texts
archives.description: Ancient Tibetan medical texts describing traditional healing practices, herbal remedies, and diagnostic techniques used in monastery infirmaries.

archives.title: Padmasambhava Life Stories
archives.description: Biographical accounts of Guru Padmasambhava's travels through the Himalayas and his role in establishing Buddhism in Sikkim.

archives.title: Ceremonial Mask Designs
archives.description: Original designs and patterns for traditional Cham dance masks used in monastery festivals and religious ceremonies.

archives.title: Monastic Rules and Discipline
archives.description: Comprehensive guide to monastic conduct, daily routines, and disciplinary codes followed by Buddhist monks in Sikkim monasteries.

archives.title: Butter Sculpture Techniques
archives.description: Detailed instructions and photographic records of traditional butter sculpture creation for religious festivals and offerings.

archives.title: Astronomical Calculations
archives.description: Mathematical texts used for calculating auspicious dates for religious ceremonies and understanding celestial movements according to Buddhist cosmology.

archives.title: Prayer Flag Blessing Texts
archives.description: Sacred texts and mantras traditionally printed on prayer flags, along with instructions for proper blessing and installation rituals.
